mapper.sql: a.id as "id", a.title as "title", a.content as "content", a.author_id as "authorId", a.read_count as "readCount", a.comment_count as "commentCount", a.create_time as "createTime", a.update_time as "updateTime", a.del_flag as "delFlag"
mapper.insert:
select blog_seq.nextval from dual
insert into blog(id,title,content,author_id,create_time) values(#{id},#{title},#{content},#{sysUser.id},sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT ,su.id as "sysUser.id",su.username as "sysUser.username" FROM blog a,sys_user su where a.author_id=su.id and a.id=#{id} and a.del_flag = '0'
SELECT ,su.id as "sysUser.id",su.username as "sysUser.username" FROM blog a,sys_user su where a.author_id=su.id and a.id=#{id} and a.author_id=#{userId} and a.del_flag = '0'
SELECT ,su.id as "sysUser.id",su.username as "sysUser.username" FROM blog a,sys_user su where a.author_id=su.id and a.AUTHOR_ID=#{authorId} and a.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY a.CREATE_TIME DESC
mapper.update: update blog set read_count = read_count + 1 where id = #{id}
update blog set title=#{title},update_time=sysdate where id=#{id}
update blog a set a.del_flag = '1' where a.id = #{id} and a.author_id = #{userId}
